name: FAILstroids
description:
My game for the Godot Wild Jam #34.

This is a MMO! Don't play this alone. Its boring! (Please tell me if you cannot connect to the default server anymore...)

Its by far my most broken game. Please don't make yourself the effort to report bugs.

Input is just W/S to (de)accelerate, A/D to turn,  LEFT/RIGHT to move sideways and SPACE or UP to shoot.

You can get cannon-upgrades by destroying asteroids. Colliding with asteroids is completely broken. Just try to avoid them...

I wanted to learn a bit about making a multiplayer-game and mess a bit with polygon interactions. So it's kind of a success, because i learned a lot.
